servinfo.title: Rear Brake Back Plate Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Hoist vehicle and remove rear wheel.
Pull up parking brake lever fully and remove rear axle nut (1).
Remove brake drum referring to Rear Brake Drum Removal and Installation .
Remove brake shoe referring to Rear Brake Shoe Removal and Installation .
Remove wheel cylinder referring to Wheel Cylinder Removal and Installation .
Remove parking brake cable (1) from brake back plate by loosening parking cable cap nut (2).
Remove rear wheel hub housing bolts (1).
Remove rear wheel hub assembly and brake back plate from knuckle.
Install brake back plate (1) and rear wheel hub assembly (2) to knuckle, and tighten wheel hub housing bolts to specified torque.
Tighten rear axle nut (1) temporarily by hand at this step.
Install parking brake cable (1) to brake back plate and tighten cable cap nut to specified torque.
Install wheel cylinder and rear brake shoe referring to step 1) to 7) of Wheel Cylinder Removal and Installation .
Install brake drum and adjust brake referring to step 1) to 4) of Rear Brake Drum Removal and Installation .
Pull up parking brake lever fully and tighten rear axle nut (1).
Install wheel and tighten wheel nuts to specified torque.
Check to ensure that brake drum is free from dragging and proper braking is obtained. Remove vehicle from hoist and perform brake test (foot brake and parking brake).
